comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Nellie Grant Cronan (1881-1972), granddaughter of Ulysses S. Grant. Her husband, Captain William Pigott Cronan (1879-1929), was briefly the acting Naval Governor of Guam (in spring 1916). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_P._Cronan Her gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19693738

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thanks for the full name and additional information.  We'll update the data to include the full name.
